data.name: Ancile
data.description: PASSIVE - You gain +0.5% Physical Power for every 1% of missing Health.

data.pros: physical lifesteal attack speed physical penetration
data.name: Asi
data.description: PASSIVE - If you drop below 35% Health, you gain an additional 25% Physical Lifesteal for 5 seconds.  Can only occur once every 15 seconds.

data.name: Armored Cloak
Bancroft's Talon
data.description: PASSIVE - You gain 1 additional Magical Power per 1% of your missing Health.

data.name: Bloodforge
data.description: PASSIVE - Each successful Basic Attack hit on an enemy grants you +5 Physical Power and +3% Physical Lifesteal for 4s (max. 3 Stacks).

data.name: Blue Acorn
data.description: PASSIVE - Flurry of Acorns now slows all targets hit.

data.name: Bluestone Pendant
data.description: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your damaging Abilities take an additional 30 Physical Damage over 2s. (Max 2 Stacks)

data.name: Book of Thoth
data.description: PASSIVE - You permanently gain 10 Mana per Stack, and receive 5 Stacks for a god kill and 1 Stack for a minion kill (max. 75 Stacks). Additionally, 3% of your Mana is converted to Magical Power.

data.name: Brawler's Beat Stick
data.description: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your Abilities have 40% reduced healing and regeneration for 8 seconds.

data.pros: magical protection health crowd control reduction
data.name: Bulwark of Hope
data.description: PASSIVE - When you take damage and are below 30% Health, you gain a Shield with health equal to 150 +10 Per Player Level for 20s. Can only occur once every 60s.

data.name: Bumba's Mask
data.description: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks deal +10 True Damage and your Abilities +10% Damage versus Jungle Camps. You are healed for 10% of a Camp's max. Health, and if you have an ally nearby, you get the normal gold reward as if you were solo.

data.name: Celestial Legion Helm
data.description: PASSIVE - Prevents the next hit of Critical Strike Damage from a Basic Attack that hits you, and you gain +40 Magical Power for 3 seconds if this occurs. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.

data.name: Charged Bow
data.description: PASSIVE - Every fourth Basic Attack triggers a chain lightning, damaging the target and up to 4 nearby enemies for 20 Physical Damage. This cannot trigger more than once every 1s.

data.pros: physical protection magical protection cooldown reduction
data.name: Cloak of Concentration
Curse
data.description: Using this item reduces all enemy gods Movement Speed by 40% in a 55 unit radius around you for 5s.  Their healing is also reduced by 65% for the duration.  Cooldown - 150s.

data.name: Death's Toll
data.description: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack restores 6 Health and 1 Mana.

data.name: Deathbringer
data.description: PASSIVE - Critical Strike damage is increased by 40%.

data.name: Demonic Grip
data.description: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks reduce your target's Magical Protection by 8% for 3s (max 4 Stacks).

data.name: Devourer's Gauntlet
data.description: PASSIVE - You permanently gain +.4 Physical Power and +.20% Physical Lifesteal per Stack, and receive 5 Stacks per god kill and 1 Stack per minion kill.  (Max. 75 Stacks).

data.name: Divine Ruin
data.description: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your abilities have 40% reduced healing and regeneration for 8 seconds.

data.name: Doom Orb
data.description: PASSIVE - You gain +2 Magical Power per stack, and receive 5 stacks per god kill and 1 stack per minion kill. Half of your stacks are lost on death. (Max 50 stacks).

data.name: Drink Me
data.description: Don't drink me.

data.pros: magical power physical protection magical penetration
data.name: Dynasty Plate Helm
Elixir of Defense
data.description: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Protections by 50 for 5 minutes or until you are killed.

data.name: Elixir of Power
data.description: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Power by 25% for 5 minutes or until you are killed.

data.name: Emerald Acorn
data.description: PASSIVE - Acorn Blast now heals Ratatoskr on hit.

data.name: Emerald Talisman
data.description: PASSIVE - Regenerates 2% of your max. Health every 8 seconds.

data.name: Ethereal Staff
data.description: PASSIVE - 2.5% of your maximum Health is converted to Magical Power.

data.name: Frenzy
data.description: Using this item removes the Disarm status from all allied gods in a 70 ft radius and gives them a +20% Physical and Magical Power buff for 10 seconds. While active you gain +10 Bonus Damage towards objectives. Cooldown - 120s.

data.name: Frostbound Hammer
data.description: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your Basic Attacks have their Movement Speed reduced by 30% and have their Attack Speed reduced 15% for 1.25 seconds.

data.name: Gauntlet of Thebes
data.description: PASSIVE - This item increases all healing received by 20%.

data.name: Gem of Isolation
data.description: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your damaging abilities will move 25% Slower for 2 seconds.

data.name: Genji's Guard
data.description: PASSIVE - When you take Magical Damage from Abilities your cooldowns are reduced by 2s. This can only occur once every 30s.

data.pros: physical power critical strike chance movement speed
data.name: Golden Bow
data.description: PASSIVE - All Basic Attacks will also hit enemies within a 15 unit radius of the target for 50% of the damage to Gods, 75% damage to Minions and Jungle Camps.

data.name: Greater Aegis
data.description: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage for 2s, preventing you from taking action. You may still move. Cooldown - 160s.

data.name: Greater Blink
data.description: Using this item will allow you to teleport short distances instantly.  You have to be Out of Combat for 5s before you can blink. Cooldown - 120s.

data.name: Greater Sprint
data.description: Using this item buffs the Movement Speed of Allies within 55 by 40% for 6s. It also makes them immune to Slows for the duration. Cooldown - 140s.

data.name: Hastened Fatalis
data.description: PASSIVE - When a Basic Attack hits a target, the attacking movement speed Debuff is removed from you for 1s.

data.name: Healing Potion
data.description: This consumable heals 250 Health over 25 seconds.

data.name: Heartward Amulet
data.description: AURA - All allies within 70 units gain +20 Magical Protections and +20 MP5.

data.name: Hide of the Nemean Lion
data.description: PASSIVE - Reflects 20% of all Basic Attack damage back to the attacker as Magical Damage.

data.pros: physical protection magical protection health mana
data.name: Hide of the Urchin
data.description: PASSIVE - You gain +3 Magical Protection and +3 Physical Protection for each god kill or assist (max. 10 Stacks).

data.name: Hydra's Lament
data.description: PASSIVE - For 8s after using an ability, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 30% damage.

data.name: Hydra's Star
data.description: PASSIVE - For 8 seconds after using an ability, your next basic attack will deal an additional 10% damage. The effect can only occur every 3 seconds.

data.name: Ichaival
data.description: PASSIVE - Every successful Basic Attack increases your Physical Power by 10 and reduces your target's Physical Power from items by 10, for 3s. (Max. 3 Stacks)

data.name: Jotunn's Wrath
Lotus Crown
data.description: PASSIVE - Any god affected by your ability heals gains +20 Physical Protection and +20 Magical Protection for 5 seconds. Cannot activate on the same target again for 10s.

data.name: Magi's Blessing
data.description: PASSIVE - Absorbs a single hard Crowd Control effect or Root once every 70 seconds. When this occurs, the owner also receives 1s of Crowd Control immunity.

data.name: Magic Acorn
data.description: This item can be upgraded from anywhere to augment Ratatoskr's abilities.

data.name: Mail of Renewal
data.description: PASSIVE - You gain 15% of your maximum Health and Mana over the next 5 seconds when you get a kill or assist against an enemy god or Objective.

data.name: Malice
data.description: PASSIVE - When you deal a Critical Strike, you deal an additional +75% of your total Physical Power as Physical Damage over the next 3s. Additional crits refresh this effect.

data.name: Mana Potion
data.description: This consumable heals 150 Mana over 25 seconds.

data.name: Mantle of Discord
data.description: PASSIVE - If you take damage below 30% health you unleash a shockwave that stuns all enemies within a range of 20 units for 1s and gain CC immunity for 1s. This effect cannot trigger more than once every 90s.

data.name: Mark of the Vanguard
data.description: PASSIVE - All damage taken is reduced by 5.

data.name: Masamune
data.description: PASSIVE - You deal additional Physical Power damage against Gods with more maximum health than you, equal to 1 power for every 10 health difference, to a maximum of 50 Power.

data.name: Midgardian Mail
data.description: PASSIVE - When hit by a Basic Attack, there is a 30% chance to slow your enemy's Movement Speed and Attack Speeds by 30% for 2 seconds.

data.name: Multi Potion
data.description: This consumable heals 125 Health and 75 Mana over 25 seconds.

data.name: Mystical Mail
data.description: AURA - Deals 40 Magical Damage per second to enemies within 25 units.

data.name: Oni Hunter's Garb
data.description: PASSIVE - Every 10s you gain +15 Magical Protection (Max 3 Stacks). Upon taking Magical Damage 1 stack is removed.

data.name: Opal Acorn
data.description: PASSIVE - Dart now shoots up to six lightning bolts to nearby targets while dashing, prioritizing gods. Lightning bolts apply on-hit effects.

data.name: Pestilence
data.description: AURA - The healing and regeneration of enemies within 55 units is reduced by 25%.

data.name: Polynomicon
data.description: PASSIVE - Using an ability gives your next Basic Attack within the next 8 seconds +75% of your Magical Power as additional Magical Damage. The effect can only apply once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Potion of Magical Might
data.description: This consumable increases your Magical Power by 50 for 5 minutes or until you are killed.

data.name: Potion of Physical Might
data.description: This consumable increases your Physical Power by 20 for 5 minutes or until you are killed.

data.name: Purification
data.description: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s.  Cooldown - 160s.

data.name: Pythagorem's Piece
data.description: AURA - +20 Magical Power and 10% Magical Lifesteal to all allies within 70 units.

data.name: Qin's Sais
data.description: PASSIVE - On Basic Attack hits, deal Physical Damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum Health. This only affects gods.

data.name: Rage
data.description: PASSIVE - If your Basic Attack does not Critically Strike, your Critical Strike Chance increases by 10% (max. 6 Stacks).  Resets on successful Critical Strike.

data.name: Reinforced Shoes
Relic
data.description: Relics provide special powers available to all gods. Your first Relic is free at Level 1 and your Second Relic is unlocked once you reach Level 12.

data.name: Rod of Asclepius
data.description: AURA - The healing and Health regeneration of allies within 70 units is increased by 20%.

data.name: Rod of Tahuti
data.description: PASSIVE - Increases Magical Power by 25%.

data.name: Runeforged Hammer
data.description: PASSIVE - Your abilities now deal an additional 15% of your Physical Power as Magical Damage against enemies, and 30% of your Physical Power as Magical Damage against slowed, rooted, or crippled enemies.

data.name: Runic Shield
data.description: AURA - All enemies within range 55 have their Magical Power reduced by 50 and Attack Speed reduced by 20%.

data.name: Salvation
data.description: Using this item restores to the owner and his teammates within 35 15% of the owner's Health and 35% of the owner's maximum Mana. Cooldown 120s.

data.name: Sanctuary
data.description: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage for 2s, preventing you from taking action. You may still move. Cooldown - 160s.

data.name: Sapphire Acorn
data.description: PASSIVE - Each acorn in Acorn Blast now sticks to gods, exploding after 2s dealing damage in an area.

data.name: Scout
data.description: Upon activation you may place a single Sentry Ward. The cooldown on this Relic resets upon returning to your fountain. Cooldown 140s.

data.name: Sentry Ward
data.description: This is a ward that allows you to see enemy movements and other wards within 45 units.  It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth.  It remains for 3 minutes or until killed. Can only carry one at a time.

data.name: Shell of Absorption
data.description: Using this item gives the owner and his allies a +45 Magical and Physical Protections for 5 seconds.  Also, all damage taken is reduced by 15%.  Cooldown - 140s.

data.pros: physical power physical protection cooldown reduction
data.name: Shield of Regrowth
data.description: PASSIVE - After healing yourself from an ability, you gain +35% movement speed for 4 seconds. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

data.name: Shielded Teleport
data.description: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower or ward, without damage interruption, while being unable to move.  You are still interrupted by hard Crowd Control.  Cooldown - 180s.

data.pros: physical power physical protection magical protection
data.name: Shifter's Shield
data.description: PASSIVE - While over 50% Health, you gain +20 Physical Power. While under 50% Health, you gain +20 Protections.

data.name: Shoes of the Magi
Soul Eater
data.description: PASSIVE - Killing an enemy eats their soul granting +0.5% Lifesteal and +0.5% Movement Speed max 20 Stacks. If you take damage below 50% health all stacks are consumed restoring 1% of your maximum health per stack.

data.name: Soul Reaver
data.description: PASSIVE - When a god takes damage from your abilities, they take 15% of their maximum Health in additional damage.  If multiple gods are hit, the damage is applied to the one with the greatest maximum Health.  This can only occur once every 60 seconds.

data.name: Soul Stone
data.description: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a basic attack tears out and stores a portion of their soul, granting +4 MP5. At 5 souls, your next ability cast consumes all souls and is at +60 Magical Power.

data.name: Sovereignty
data.description: AURA - All allies within 70 units gain +30 Physical Protections and +25 HP5.

data.name: Spear of Desolation
data.description: PASSIVE - If you kill an Enemy God all of your cooldowns are reduced by 8 seconds. This cannot activate more than once every 30s.

data.name: Spear of the Magus
data.description: PASSIVE - Your abilities reduce your target's Magical Protection by 10 for 5 seconds (max. 3 Stacks).

data.pros: physical protection mana crowd control reduction
data.name: Spectral Armor
data.description: PASSIVE - When you activate a Relic you gain Ghost Walking for 4s and can move through enemy players and Enemy Deployables.

data.name: Spell Focus
data.description: PASSIVE - You gain +22% Magical Penetration.

data.name: Spiked Shield
data.description: AURA - Reduces the Physical Protection of enemies within 55 units by 8.

data.name: Spirit Robe
data.description: PASSIVE - You gain an additional 15% Damage Mitigation for 3s whenever you are hit with a hard Crowd Control Effect.  This can only occur once every 10 seconds.

data.name: Stone Cutting Sword
data.description: PASSIVE - Melee Basic Attacks decreases enemy Physical protections by 10, and increase your physical protection by 10 for 3s (max. 3 Stacks).

data.name: Stone of Gaia
data.description: PASSIVE - Regenerates 2% of your max. Health every 5 seconds.

data.name: Sunder
data.description: Upon activation fire a bolt that stops on the first god hit and deals 40 True Damage +14 Damage per God level and reduces the target's protections by 25% for 4s. Cooldown 120s.

data.name: Talaria Boots
data.description: PASSIVE - You gain +14% additional Movement Speed and +25 HP5 while out of combat. Each time you hit an enemy god you earn +30 Gold. This cannot occur on the same god more than once every 90s.

data.name: Telkhines Ring
data.description: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attack hits deal 35 additional Magical Damage to the target.

data.name: The Crusher
data.description: PASSIVE - Each Basic Attack against towers and phoenixes grants a Stack that increases your Attack Speed by 10% and Physical Penetration by 5 for 2s.(Max. 5 Stacks).

data.name: The Executioner
data.description: PASSIVE - Basic Attacks against an enemy reduce your target's Physical Protection by 8% for 3 seconds (max. 4 Stacks).

data.name: Throwing Dagger
data.description: PASSIVE - All basic attacks will also hit enemies within a 15 ft radius of the target for 25% of the damage to Gods, 50% damage to Minions and Jungle Camps.

data.name: Titan's Bane
data.description: PASSIVE - All of your Physical attacks gain 33% Physical Penetration.

data.name: Topaz Acorn
data.description: PASSIVE - Dart now stuns targets that are hit twice within 10s.

data.name: Transcendence
data.description: PASSIVE - You permanently gain 15 Mana per Stack, and receive 5 Stacks for a god kill, and 1 Stack for a minion kill (max. 50 stacks). Additionally, 3% of your Mana is converted to Physical Power.

data.name: Travelers Shoes
data.description: PASSIVE - You gain +14% additional Movement Speed and +25 HP5 while out of combat. Each time you hit an enemy god you earn +30 Gold. This cannot occur on the same god more than once every 90s.

data.name: Vampiric Shroud
data.description: PASSIVE - Killing an enemy restores 10 Health and 10 Mana.

data.name: Void Shield
data.description: AURA - Reduces the Physical Protection of enemies within 55 units by 20.

data.name: Void Stone
data.description: AURA - Reduces the Magical Protection of enemies within 55 units by 20.

data.name: Ward
data.description: This is a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements with 45 units.  It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth.  It remains for 3 minutes or until killed.

data.name: Ward Stone
data.description: AURA - Reduces the Magical Protection of enemies within 55 units by 8.

data.name: Warlock's Sash
data.description: PASSIVE - You permanently gain +3 Health and +.6 Magical Power per Stack, and receive 5 Stacks for a god kill and 1 Stack per minion kill.  (Max. 100 Stacks).

data.name: Watcher's Gift
data.description: PASSIVE - Being within assist range of a minion or jungle camp monster death without dealing the killing blow awards +4 bonus gold, and also restores +10 Health and +5 Mana.

data.name: Wind Demon
data.description: PASSIVE - Your Critical Hits now also reduce healing on enemies by 40% for 8s.

data.name: Winged Blade
data.description: PASSIVE - When hit by a Slow, you are immune to Slows and your movement speed is increased by 20% for 4s.  Only occurs once every 30 seconds.

data.name: Witchblade
data.description: AURA - All enemies within 55 units have their Attack Speed reduced by 20% and their Physical Power reduced by 30.

data.name: Wrath of the Gods
data.description: Using this item deals 480 damage, in a 15 unit radius, to a a single enemy minion or jungle monster. Target is always the one with the highest maximum health. This item deals 1000 damage to jungle bosses. Subsequent effects from your team on the same target will deal 50% damage. Cooldown - 60s.
